Header: SF-J Commander Makes Formal Visit to 3 SLSC
Content: Major General Ruwan Wanigasooriya, Commander Security Forces - Jaffna (SF-J) made a formal visit to the 3 Sri Lanka Signal Corps (SLSC) on Monday (7). Commanding Officer, 3 SLSC after receiving the visiting SF-J Commander presented a comprehensive briefing on role and tasks of the unit. Afterwards, the visiting Commander addressed Officers and Other Ranks of the 3 SLSC.
